summary.span: Represents a character as a UTF-16 code unit.

span.span: Represents a character as a UTF-16 code unit.

remarks.format:
## Remarks [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]使用结构来表示 Unicode 字符。The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] uses the structure to represent a Unicode character. Unicode 标准用名为一个码位的唯一 21 位标量数字标识的每个 Unicode 字符，并定义指定如何将码位编码为一个或多个 16 位值的一个序列的 UTF 16 编码形式。The Unicode Standard identifies each Unicode character with a unique 21-bit scalar number called a code point, and defines the UTF-16 encoding form that specifies how a code point is encoded into a sequence of one or more 16-bit values. 每个 16 位值范围是从十六进制 0x0000 到 0xFFFF 并存储在结构。Each 16-bit value ranges from hexadecimal 0x0000 through 0xFFFF and is stored in a structure. 值对象是其 16 位数字 （序号） 值。The value of a object is its 16-bit numeric (ordinal) value. 以下各部分分别之间的关系对象和一个字符，并讨论一些常见的任务执行实例。The following sections examine the relationship between a object and a character and discuss some common tasks performed with instances. [Char 对象、 Unicode 字符和字符串](#Relationship) [Char objects, Unicode characters, and strings](#Relationship) [字符和字符类别](#Categories) [Characters and character categories](#Categories) [字符和文本元素](#Elements) [Characters and text elements](#Elements) [常见的操作](#Operations) [Common operations](#Operations) [Char 值和互操作Char values and interop](#Interop) ## Char 对象、 Unicode 字符和字符串Char objects, Unicode characters, and strings 一个对象是的有序集合表示的文本字符串的结构。A object is a sequential collection of structures that represents a string of text. 大多数的 Unicode 字符可表示由单个对象由多个表示代理项对和/或组合字符序列，编码为基字符的字符但对象。Most Unicode characters can be represented by a single object, but a character that is encoded as a base character, surrogate pair, and/or combining character sequence is represented by multiple objects. 出于此原因，结构中对象并不一定等同于单个 Unicode 字符。For this reason, a structure in a object is not necessarily equivalent to a single Unicode character. 多个 16 位代码单元用于表示单个 Unicode 字符，在以下情况下：Multiple 16-bit code units are used to represent single Unicode characters in the following cases: - 标志符号，可能包含单个字符或个基字符后跟一个或多个组合字符。Glyphs, which may consist of a single character or of a base character followed by one or more combining characters. 例如，由一个表示字符 ä对象单位是 U + 0061 跟一个其代码对象，其代码单元为 U + 0308年。For example, the character ä is represented by a object whose code unit is U+0061 followed by a object whose code unit is U+0308. (还可通过一个单一定义字符？ ¤对象，它具有一个代码单元的 U + 00E4。)下面的示例说明了字符？ ¤ 包含两个对象。(The character ä can also be defined by a single object that has a code unit of U+00E4.) The following example illustrates that the character ä consists of two objects. [!code-csharp[System.Char.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.char.class/cs/grapheme1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Char.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.char.class/vb/grapheme1.vb#1)] - Unicode 基本多语言平面 (BMP) 外的字符。Characters outside the Unicode Basic Multilingual Plane (BMP). Unicode 支持 BMP、 表示平面 0 除了十六个平面。Unicode supports sixteen planes in addition to the BMP, which represents plane 0. Unicode 码位表示 UTF-32 中包括平面的 21 位值。A Unicode code point is represented in UTF-32 by a 21-bit value that includes the plane. 例如，U + 1D160 表示音乐符号第八个注释字符。For example, U+1D160 represents the MUSICAL SYMBOL EIGHTH NOTE character. 因为 utf-16 编码仅 16 位，由以 utf-16 代理项对表示位于 BMP 之外的字符。Because UTF-16 encoding has only 16 bits, characters outside the BMP are represented by surrogate pairs in UTF-16. 下面的示例说明了 U + 1D160，音乐符号第八个注释字符的 UTF-32 等效项是 U + D834 U + DD60。The following example illustrates that the UTF-32 equivalent of U+1D160, the MUSICAL SYMBOL EIGHTH NOTE character, is U+D834 U+DD60. U + D834 是高代理项;从 u+d800 到 U + DBFF 的高代理项范围。U+D834 is the high surrogate; high surrogates range from U+D800 through U+DBFF. U + DD60 是低代理项;低代理项是从 U+DC00 到 U + DFFF 的范围。U+DD60 is the low surrogate; low surrogates range from U+DC00 through U+DFFF. [!code-csharp[System.Char.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.char.class/cs/surrogate1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Char.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.char.class/vb/surrogate1.vb#2)] ## 字符和字符类别Characters and character categories 每个 Unicode 字符或有效的代理项对属于 Unicode 类别。Each Unicode character or valid surrogate pair belongs to a Unicode category. 在.NET Framework 中，Unicode 类别的成员由表示枚举和包括的值如下所述， ，和，例如。In the .NET Framework, Unicode categories are represented by members of the enumeration and include values such as , , and , for example. 若要确定一个字符的 Unicode 类别，请调用方法。To determine the Unicode category of a character, you call the method. 例如，下面的示例调用字符串中显示的每个字符的 Unicode 类别。For example, the following example calls the to display the Unicode category of each character in a string. [!code-csharp[System.Char.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.char.class/cs/GetUnicodeCategory3.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Char.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.char.class/vb/GetUnicodeCategory3.vb#6)] 在内部，对字符超出 ASCII 范围 (U + 0000 到 U + 00FF)，方法取决于所报告的 Unicode 类别类。Internally, for characters outside the ASCII range (U+0000 through U+00FF), the method depends on Unicode categories reported by the class. 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v462](~/includes/net-v462-md.md)]，Unicode 字符的分类基于[Unicode 标准、 版本 8.0.0](https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode8.0.0/)。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v462](~/includes/net-v462-md.md)], Unicode characters are classified based on [The Unicode Standard, Version 8.0.0](https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode8.0.0/). 在从.NET Framework 的版本[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]到[!INCLUDE[net_v461](~/includes/net-v461-md.md)]，它们的分类基于[Unicode 标准、 6.3.0 版](https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode6.3.0/)。In versions of the .NET Framework from the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] to the [!INCLUDE[net_v461](~/includes/net-v461-md.md)], they are classified based on [The Unicode Standard, Version 6.3.0](https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode6.3.0/). ## 字符和文本元素Characters and text elements 因为可以由多个表示单个字符对象，它并不总是有意义，以便使用个人对象。Because a single character can be represented by multiple objects, it is not always meaningful to work with individual objects. 例如，下面的示例将转换为 utf-16 编码代码单位表示爱琴海的数字为 0 到 9 的 Unicode 码位。For instance, the following example converts the Unicode code points that represent the Aegean numbers zero through 9 to UTF-16 encoded code units. 因为错误地等同对象包含的字符，它不正确地报告生成的字符串具有 20 个字符。Because it erroneously equates objects with characters, it inaccurately reports that the resulting string has 20 characters. [!code-csharp[System.Char.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.char.class/cs/textelements2.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Char.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.char.class/vb/textelements2.vb#3)] 您可以执行以下操作来避免假设的对象表示单个字符。You can do the following to avoid the assumption that a object represents a single character. - 您可以使用中而不是其各个字符来表示和分析语言内容处理整个对象。You can work with a object in its entirety instead of working with its individual characters to represent and analyze linguistic content. - 可以使用类来处理文本元素而不是个人对象。You can use the class to work with text elements instead of individual objects. 下面的示例使用对象中包含的爱琴的字符串的文本元素数目进行计数数字零到 9。The following example uses the object to count the number of text elements in a string that consists of the Aegean numbers zero through nine. 它将代理项对视为单个字符，因为它正确地报告该字符串包含 10 个字符。Because it considers a surrogate pair a single character, it correctly reports that the string contains ten characters. [!code-csharp[System.Char.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.char.class/cs/textelements2a.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Char.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.char.class/vb/textelements2a.vb#4)] - 如果字符串包含基本字符具有一个或多个组合字符，则可以调用方法将子字符串转换为单一的 utf-16 编码的代码单元。If a string contains a base character that has one or more combining characters, you can call the method to convert the substring to a single UTF-16 encoded code unit. 下面的示例调用方法将基本字符 U + 0061 (拉丁文小写字母 A) 和组合字符 U + 0308 （组合以分音符） 转换为 U + 00E4 （拉丁文小写字母与分音符）。The following example calls the method to convert the base character U+0061 (LATIN SMALL LETTER A) and combining character U+0308 (COMBINING DIAERESIS) to U+00E4 (LATIN SMALL LETTER A WITH DIAERESIS). [!code-csharp[System.Char.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.char.class/cs/normalized.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Char.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.char.class/vb/normalized.vb#5)] ## 常见的操作Common operations 结构提供方法来比较对象，将当前值转换对象复制到另一种类型的对象，并确定的 Unicode 类别对象：The structure provides methods to compare objects, convert the value of the current object to an object of another type, and determine the Unicode category of a object: |任务To do this|使用这些`System.Char`方法Use these `System.Char` methods| |----------------|-------------------------------------| |比较对象Compare objects| 和 and | |将代码点转换为字符串Convert a code point to a string|| |将转换对象或代理项对的码位的对象Convert a object or a surrogate pair of objects to a code point|单个字符： For a single character:

对于代理项对或字符串中的字符： For a surrogate pair or a character in a string: | |获取一个字符的 Unicode 类别Get the Unicode category of a character|| |确定字符是否为数字、 字母、 标点符号等特定 Unicode 类别中，控制字符，等等Determine whether a character is in a particular Unicode category such as digit, letter, punctuation, control character, and so on|， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，和 , , , , , , , , , , , , , , and | |将转换表示的数字为数值类型的对象Convert a object that represents a number to a numeric value type|| |转换到字符串中的字符对象Convert a character in a string into a object| 和 and | |将转换对象传递给对象Convert a object to a object|| |更改的大小写对象Change the case of a object|、、 和 , , , and | ## Char 值和互操作Char values and interop 当托管类型，表示为一个 Unicode utf-16 编码的代码单元，传递到非托管代码，则默认情况下设置为 ANSI 字符转换为互操作封送处理程序。When a managed type, which is represented as a Unicode UTF-16 encoded code unit, is passed to unmanaged code, the interop marshaler converts the character set to ANSI by default. 您可以将应用属性设置为平台调用声明并属性为 COM 互操作声明，以控制哪些字符集封送类型使用。You can apply the attribute to platform invoke declarations and the attribute to a COM interop declaration to control which character set a marshaled type uses. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一些中的方法。The following code example demonstrates some of the methods in . [!code-cpp[System.Char [Type Level]#23](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Char [Type Level]/CPP/charstructure.cpp#23)] [!code-csharp[System.Char [Type Level]#23](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Char [Type Level]/CS/charstructure.cs#23)] [!code-vb[System.Char [Type Level]#23](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Char [Type Level]/VB/charstructure.vb#23)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实现接口，并且执行略微优于方法因为它不具有要转换`value`参数的对象。This method implements the interface and performs slightly better than the method because it does not have to convert the `value` parameter to an object. 此方法执行的比较基于此实例的编码值和`value`，不是它们按字典编辑顺序的特征。The comparison performed by this method is based on the encoded values of this instance and `value`, not their lexicographical characteristics. 如果方法参数类型具有较少的位 （是更窄） 实例类型中，某些编程语言执行参数的值转换具有更多位数的值的隐式扩大转换。If the method parameter type has fewer bits (is narrower) than the instance type, some programming languages perform an implicit widening conversion that transforms the value of the parameter into a value with more bits. 例如，假设实例类型是且参数类型为。For example, suppose the instance type is and the parameter type is . Microsoft C# 编译器将生成表示形式的参数值的说明对象，然后生成比较的值的方法实例和参数表示形式。The Microsoft C# compiler generates instructions to represent the value of the parameter as an object, then generates a method that compares the values of the instance and the parameter representation. 通常情况下，数值类型执行隐式扩大转换。Typically, implicit widening conversions are performed on numeric types. 请查阅您的编程语言的文档以确定其编译器是否执行扩大转换。Consult your programming language's documentation to determine if its compiler performs widening conversions. 如果实例和参数类型不匹配和没有合适的转换不可用，编译器将生成说明框参数并调用重载采用参数。If the instance and parameter types mismatch and a suitable conversion is not available, the compiler generates instructions to box the parameter and invoke the overload that takes an parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了泛型和非泛型版本的`CompareTo`多个值和引用类型的方法。The following code example demonstrates generic and non-generic versions of the `CompareTo` method for several value and reference types. [!code-cpp[T.CompareTo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/T.CompareTo/CPP/cat.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[T.CompareTo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/T.CompareTo/CS/cat.cs#1)] [!code-vb[T.CompareTo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/T.CompareTo/VB/cat.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法实现接口。The method implements the interface. `value`参数必须是`null`的实例或; 否则为将引发异常。The `value` parameter must be `null` or an instance of ; otherwise, an exception is thrown. 此方法执行的比较基于此实例的编码值和`value`，不一定是它们按字典编辑顺序的特征。The comparison performed by this method is based on the encoded values of this instance and `value`, not necessarily their lexicographical characteristics. 任何实例，而不考虑其值被视为大于`null`。Any instance of , regardless of its value, is considered greater than `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了。The following code example demonstrates . remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法将转换为 utf-16 编码字符串的 21 位 Unicode 码位，如使用方法测试字符串之前和。Use this method to convert a 21-bit Unicode code point to a UTF-16 encoded string before testing the string with methods such as and . 有效的码位外部基本多语言平面 (BMP) 始终会将一个有效的代理项对。A valid code point outside the Basic Multilingual Plane (BMP) always yields a valid surrogate pair. 但是，BMP 内的有效的代码点可能会产生有效的结果根据 Unicode 标准，因为在转换中不使用任何语言的处理。However, a valid code point within the BMP might not yield a valid result according to the Unicode standard because no linguistic processing is used in the conversion. 因此，使用类将 UTF-32 数据大容量到大容量 utf-16 数据。For that reason, use the class to convert bulk UTF-32 data into bulk UTF-16 data. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示和方法。The following code example demonstrates the and methods. [!code-cpp[char.cvtutf32#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/char.cvtutf32/CPP/utf.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[char.cvtutf32#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/char.cvtutf32/CS/utf.cs#1)] [!code-vb[char.cvtutf32#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/char.cvtutf32/VB/utf.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法以将代理项对转换为 21 位 Unicode 码位。Use this method to convert a surrogate pair into a 21-bit Unicode code point. 若要将 utf-16 数据转换为 UTF-32 数据，请使用类。To convert UTF-16 data into UTF-32 data, use the class. 通常，utf-16 编码为 16 位代码单元表示单个 Unicode 字符。Ordinarily, UTF-16 encoding represents a single Unicode character as a 16-bit code unit. 但是，它还支持的代理项对，从而允许单个抽象字符而无法表示为两个 16 位代码单元。However, it also supports surrogate pairs, which allow a single abstract character to be represented as two 16-bit code units. 这两个对象必须具有代码单位从 u+d800 到 U + DBFF 的第一个 （高） 的代理项和 U + DC00 到 U + DFFF 的第二个 （低） 的代理项的范围。These two objects must have code units that range from U+D800 to U+DBFF for the first (high) surrogate and from U+DC00 to U+DFFF for the second (low) surrogate. 只支持 utf-16 代理项对编码。Surrogate pairs are supported only by UTF-16 encoding. 此方法允许将 utf-16 代理项对表示要转换为使用 UTF-32 编码的字符的字符。This method allows a character represented by a UTF-16 surrogate pair to be converted to a character using UTF-32 encoding. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示和方法。The following code example demonstrates the and methods. remarks.format: ## Remarks `c`参数必须是数字值的表示形式。The `c` parameter must be the representation of a numeric value. 例如，如果`c`是"5"，则返回值为 5。For example, if `c` is "5", the return value is 5. 但是，如果`c`是"z"的返回值为-1.0。However, if `c` is "z", the return value is -1.0. 当且仅当它是以下值之一的成员具有关联的数字值的字符类别： `DecimalDigitNumber`， `LetterNumber`，或`OtherNumber`。A character has an associated numeric value if and only if it is a member of one of the following categories: `DecimalDigitNumber`, `LetterNumber`, or `OtherNumber`. 方法假设`c`对应于单一语言字符，并检查该字符是否可以转换为十进制数字。The method assumes that `c` corresponds to a single linguistic character and checks whether that character can be converted to a decimal digit. 但是，由两个表示 Unicode 标准中的某些数字形成一个代理项对的对象。However, some numbers in the Unicode standard are represented by two objects that form a surrogate pair. 例如，数字系统爱琴包含码位 U + 10107 至 U + 10133。For example, the Aegean numbering system consists of code points U+10107 through U+10133. 下面的示例使用方法可实例化一个字符串，表示爱琴海的第一个。The following example uses the method to instantiate a string that represents AEGEAN NUMBER ONE. 中的示例所示，输出的形式方法返回-1，如果它传递一个高代理项或低代理项的此字符。As the output from the example shows, the method returns -1 if it is passed either a high surrogate or a low surrogate of this character. remarks.format: ## Remarks `s`参数必须是数字值的字符串表示形式。The `s` parameter must be the string representation of a numeric value. 例如，如果位置处的字符`index`在`s`是"5"，则返回值为 5。For example, if the character at position `index` in `s` is "5", the return value is 5. 但是，如果位置处的字符`index`在`s`是"z"的返回值为-1。However, if the character at position `index` in `s` is "z", the return value is -1. 在字符串中的字符位置从零开始编制索引。Character positions in a string are indexed starting from zero. 当且仅当它是以下值之一的成员具有关联的数字值的字符类别： `DecimalDigitNumber`， `LetterNumber`，或`OtherNumber`。A character has an associated numeric value if and only if it is a member of one of the following categories: `DecimalDigitNumber`, `LetterNumber`, or `OtherNumber`. 如果位置处的对象`index`第一个字符是一个有效的代理项对，方法确定是否将代理项对窗体的一个数字。If the object at position `index` is the first character of a valid surrogate pair, the method determines whether the surrogate pair forms a numeric digit. 例如，数字系统爱琴包含码位 U + 10107 至 U + 10133。For example, the Aegean numbering system consists of code points U+10107 through U+10133. 下面的示例使用方法可实例化一个字符串，表示每个爱琴海数目。The following example uses the method to instantiate a string that represents each Aegean number. 中的示例所示，输出的形式方法返回正确的数字值，如果它传递爱琴海的数目的高代理项。As the output from the example shows, the method returns the correct numeric value if it is passed the high surrogate of an Aegean number. 但是，如果它传递的低代理项，它会考虑仅在隔离的低代理项，并返回-1。However, if it is passed the low surrogate, it considers only the low surrogate in isolation and returns -1. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不会始终返回相同值作为方法作为参数传递特定的字符时。The method does not always return the same value as the method when it is passed a particular character as a parameter. 方法设计以反映当前版本的 Unicode 标准。The method is designed to reflect the current version of the Unicode standard. 与此相反，尽管方法通常反映当前版本的 Unicode 标准，它可能返回的字符类别基于标准的以前版本或它可能返回不同的类别，与当前标准顺序若要保留向后兼容性。In contrast, although the method usually reflects the current version of the Unicode standard, it may return a character's category based on a previous version of the standard or it may return a category that differs from the current standard in order to preserve backward compatibility. 因此，我们建议你使用方法而不是。As a result, we recommend that you use the method instead of . 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v462](~/includes/net-v462-md.md)]，Unicode 字符的分类基于[Unix 标准、 8.0.0 版](https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode8.0.0/)。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v462](~/includes/net-v462-md.md)], Unicode characters are classified based on [The Unix Standard, Version 8.0.0](https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode8.0.0/). 在从.NET Framework 的版本[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]到[!INCLUDE[net_v461](~/includes/net-v461-md.md)]，它们的分类基于[Unix 标准、 6.3.0 版](https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode6.3.0/)。In versions of the .NET Framework from the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] to the [!INCLUDE[net_v461](~/includes/net-v461-md.md)], they are classified based on [The Unix Standard, Version 6.3.0](https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode6.3.0/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了。The following code example demonstrates . Unicode 标准将从 \U0000 到 \U001F，\U007F，和对控制字符到 \U009F \U0080 分配码位。The Unicode standard assigns code points from \U0000 to \U001F, \U007F, and from \U0080 to \U009F to control characters. 根据 Unicode 标准中，这些值都将被解释为控制字符，除非其使用否则定义应用程序。According to the Unicode standard, these values are to be interpreted as control characters unless their use is otherwise defined by an application. 有效的控制字符均隶属于类别。Valid control characters are members of the category. ## Examples 下面的示例枚举字符串中的字符，并确定是否需要针对任何控制字符。The following example enumerates the characters in a string and determines whether any are control characters. remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了表示使用 16 位代码点的单个字符，utf-16 编码允许抽象字符来表示使用两个 16 位码位，这被称为代理项对。In addition to representing single characters using a 16-bit code point, UTF-16 encoding allows abstract characters to be represented using two 16-bit code points, which is known as a surrogate pair. 在此对的第一个元素是高代理项。The first element in this pair is the high surrogate. 其码位的范围从 u+d800 到 U + DBFF。Its code point can range from U+D800 to U+DBFF. 单独的代理项具有其自身; 的任何解释它是有意义的仅当使用作为代理项对的一部分。An individual surrogate has no interpretation of its own; it is meaningful only when used as part of a surrogate pair. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示， ，和方法。The following code example demonstrates the , , and methods. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可确定是否是 Unicode 字母的任何类别的成员。This method determines whether a is a member of any category of Unicode letter. Unicode 字母包括：Unicode letters include the following: - 大写形式，例如 u+0041 (LATIN CAPITAL LETTER A) 通过 U + 005A (LATIN CAPITAL LETTER Z)，或 u+0400 (西里尔文大写字母 IE WITH GRAVE) 通过 U + 042F （西里尔文大写字母白费）。Uppercase letters, such as U+0041 (LATIN CAPITAL LETTER A) through U+005A (LATIN CAPITAL LETTER Z), or U+0400 (CYRILLIC CAPITAL LETTER IE WITH GRAVE) through U+042F (CYRILLIC CAPITAL LETTER YA). 这些字符均隶属于类别。These characters are members of the category. - 小写字母，如 U + 0061 通过 U + 007A (拉丁文小写字母 A) (拉丁文小写字母 Z)，或 U + 03AC （希腊文小写字母 ALPHA 与音调符号） 通过 U + 03CE （希腊文小写字母 OMEGA 与音调符号）。Lowercase letters, such as U+0061 (LATIN SMALL LETTER A) through U+007A (LATIN SMALL LETTER Z), or U+03AC (GREEK SMALL LETTER ALPHA WITH TONOS) through U+03CE (GREEK SMALL LETTER OMEGA WITH TONOS). 这些字符均隶属于类别。These characters are members of the category. - 标题大小写的字母中，如 U + 01 C 5 （LATIN CAPITAL LETTER D 与小写字母 Z 与抑扬符） 或 U + 1FFC (希腊文大写字母 OMEGA 与 PROSGEGRAMMENI)。Title case letters, such as U+01C5 (LATIN CAPITAL LETTER D WITH SMALL LETTER Z WITH CARON) or U+1FFC (GREEK CAPITAL LETTER OMEGA WITH PROSGEGRAMMENI). 这些字符均隶属于类别。These characters are members of the category. - 修饰符，如 U + 02B0 (修饰符字母小型 H) 到 U + 02C 1 （修饰符字母反转喉塞音停止），或 U + 1D2C (修饰符字母大写 A) 通过 U + 1D 61 （修饰符字母小卡方分布）。Modifiers, such as U+02B0 (MODIFIER LETTER SMALL H) through U+02C1 (MODIFIER LETTER REVERSED GLOTTAL STOP), or U+1D2C (MODIFIER LETTER CAPITAL A) through U+1D61 (MODIFIER LETTER SMALL CHI). 这些字符均隶属于类别。These characters are members of the category. - 其他字母，如 U + 05 D 0 (希伯来语 LETTER ALEF) 到 U + 05EA (希伯来语字母 TAV)，U + 0621 通过 U + 063A (阿拉伯语字母 HAMZA) (阿拉伯语字母 GHAIN) 或 U + 4E00 (\) 通过 U + 9 FC 3 (\)。Other letters, such as U+05D0 (HEBREW LETTER ALEF) through U+05EA (HEBREW LETTER TAV), U+0621 (ARABIC LETTER HAMZA) through U+063A (ARABIC LETTER GHAIN), or U+4E00 (\) through U+9FC3 (\). 这些字符均隶属于类别。These characters are members of the category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了表示使用 16 位代码点的单个字符，utf-16 编码允许抽象字符来表示使用两个 16 位码位，这被称为代理项对。In addition to representing single characters using a 16-bit code point, UTF-16 encoding allows abstract characters to be represented using two 16-bit code points, which is known as a surrogate pair. 在此对的第二个元素是低代理项。The second element in this pair is the low surrogate. 其码位的范围从 u+dc00 到 U + DFFF。Its code point can range from U+DC00 to U+DFFF. 单独的代理项具有其自身; 的任何解释它是有意义的仅当使用作为代理项对的一部分。An individual surrogate has no interpretation of its own; it is meaningful only when used as part of a surrogate pair. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示， ，和方法。The following code example demonstrates the , , and methods. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可确定是否的任何数值的 Unicode 类别。This method determines whether a is of any numeric Unicode category. 除了包含数字，数字包括字符、 分数、 下标、 上标、 罗马数字、 货币分子和循环的数。In addition to including digits, numbers include characters, fractions, subscripts, superscripts, Roman numerals, currency numerators, and encircled numbers. 此方法与形成对比方法，这可确定是否是基数 10 位数字。This method contrasts with the method, which determines whether a is a radix-10 digit. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法不应以确定是否一个字符串，包含的数字字符 （例如，通过调用方法对字符串中每个字符）。The method is not intended to determine whether a string consists of numeric characters (for example, by calling the method for each character in a string). 若要确定字符串是否包含数字字符，调用的重载之一`TryParse`方法 (如或的整型或浮点型类型。To determine whether a string consists of numeric characters, call one of the overloads of the `TryParse` method (such as or of an integral or floating point type. 有效的数字是的成员， ，或类别。Valid numbers are members of the , , or category. 方法假设`c`对应于单一语言字符，并检查是否该字符表示的数字。The method assumes that `c` corresponds to a single linguistic character and checks whether that character represents a number. 但是，由两个表示 Unicode 标准中的某些数字形成一个代理项对的对象。However, some numbers in the Unicode standard are represented by two objects that form a surrogate pair. 例如，数字系统爱琴包含码位 U + 10107 至 U + 10133。For example, the Aegean numbering system consists of code points U+10107 through U+10133. 下面的示例使用方法可实例化一个字符串，表示爱琴海的第一个。The following example uses the method to instantiate a string that represents AEGEAN NUMBER ONE. 如示例所示，输出方法将返回`false`如果它传递一个高代理项或低代理项的此字符。As the output from the example shows, the method returns `false` if it is passed either a high surrogate or a low surrogate of this character. [!code-csharp[System.Char.IsNumber#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Char.IsNumber/CS/isnumber1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Char.IsNumber#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Char.IsNumber/VB/isnumber1.vb#1)] ## Examples 下面的示例演示。The following example demonstrates . remarks.format: ## Remarks Unicode 标准可识别分隔符的三个子的类别：The Unicode standard recognizes three subcategories of separators: - 空格分隔符 (类别)，其中包括 \u0020 等字符。Space separators (the category), which includes characters such as \u0020. - 行分隔符 (类别)，其中包括 \u2028。Line separators (the category), which includes \u2028. - 段落分隔符 (类别)，其中包括 \u2029。Paragraph separators (the category), which includes \u2029. > [!NOTE] > Unicode 标准将字符 \u000A (LF)、 \u000C (FF) 和 \u000D (CR) 分类为控制字符 (的成员类别)，而不是分隔符字符。The Unicode standard classifies the characters \u000A (LF), \u000C (FF), and \u000D (CR) as control characters (members of the category), not as separator characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代理项是使用 utf-16 代码单位从 u+d800 到 U + DFFF 的范围中的对象。A surrogate is a object with a UTF-16 code unit in the range from U+D800 to U+DFFF. 每个字符且在此范围内的代码单元属于类别。Each character with a code unit in this range belongs to the category. 单独的代理项代码单位不具有其自己的任何解释，但具有含义仅当使用作为代理项对的一部分。The individual surrogate code unit has no interpretation of its own, but has meaning only when used as part of a surrogate pair. 有关代理项对的详细信息，请参阅上的 Unicode 标准[Unicode 主页](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)。For more information about surrogate pairs, see the Unicode Standard at the [Unicode home page](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123). ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法。The following example demonstrates the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，由单个 16 位 Unicode 代码单元表示单个字符。Ordinarily, a single character is represented by a single 16-bit Unicode code unit. Utf-16 编码还支持的代理项对，从而允许单个抽象字符来表示的两个 16 位代码单元。UTF-16 encoding also supports surrogate pairs, which allow a single abstract character to be represented by two 16-bit code units. 第一个代码单元，其值的范围从 u+d800 到 U + DBFF，是高代理项。The first code unit, whose value can range from U+D800 to U+DBFF, is the high surrogate. 第二个代码单元，其值的范围从 u+dc00 到 U + DFFF，则低代理项。The second code unit, whose value can range from U+DC00 to U+DFFF, is the low surrogate. 单独的代理项码位具有其自己的解释。Individual surrogate code points have no interpretation of their own. 有关代理项字符和 Unicode 标准的详细信息，请参阅[Unicode 主页](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=37123)。For more information about surrogates and the Unicode Standard, see the [Unicode home page](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=37123). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示， ，和方法。The following code example demonstrates the , , and methods. remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，由单个 16 位 Unicode 代码单元表示单个字符。Ordinarily, a single character is represented by a single 16-bit Unicode code unit. Utf-16 编码还支持的代理项对，从而允许单个抽象字符来表示的两个 16 位代码单元。UTF-16 encoding also supports surrogate pairs, which allow a single abstract character to be represented by two 16-bit code units. 第一个代码单元，其值的范围从 u+d800 到 U + DBFF，是高代理项。The first code unit, whose value can range from U+D800 to U+DBFF, is the high surrogate. 第二个代码单元，其值的范围从 u+dc00 到 U + DFFF，则低代理项。The second code unit, whose value can range from U+DC00 to U+DFFF, is the low surrogate. 单独的代理项码位具有其自己的解释。Individual surrogate code points have no interpretation of their own. 有关代理项字符和 Unicode 标准的详细信息，请参阅[Unicode 主页](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=37123)。For more information about surrogates and the Unicode Standard, see the [Unicode home page](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=37123). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示， ，和方法。The following code example demonstrates the , , and methods. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有效的符号是中的以下类别的成员: `MathSymbol`， `CurrencySymbol`， `ModifierSymbol`，和`OtherSymbol`。Valid symbols are members of the following categories in : `MathSymbol`, `CurrencySymbol`, `ModifierSymbol`, and `OtherSymbol`. Unicode 标准中的符号是一组松散定义的字符包括以下各项：Symbols in the Unicode standard are a loosely defined set of characters that include the following: - 货币符号。Currency symbols. - Letterlike 符号，其中包括一系列数学字母数字符号，以及诸如 ℅、 № 之类的符号和™。Letterlike symbols, which include a set of mathematical alphanumeric symbols as well as symbols such as ℅, №, and ™. - 数字形式，如上标和下标。Number forms, such as subscripts and superscripts. - 数学运算符和箭头。Mathematical operators and arrows. - 几何符号。Geometric symbols. - 技术符号。Technical symbols. - Braille 模式。Braille patterns. - 丁贝符。Dingbats.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 空白字符是以下的 Unicode 字符：White space characters are the following Unicode characters: - 成员类别，其中包括字符空格 (U + 0020)，则欧甘文空间标记 (U + 1680)，EN 四 (U + 2000)、 EM 四 （U + 2001 年），EN 空格 (U + 2002)、 EM 空格 (U + 2003)，三个每个 EM 空间 （U + 2004 年），四个每个 EM 空间 (U + 2005) 中，六个每个 EM空格 (U + 2006)、 图空格 (U + 2007)，标点空格 (U + 2008)，精简空格 (U + 2009)，细空格 (U + 200A)、 窄无中断空格 (U + 202F)、 中等数学空格 (U + 205F) 和表意空格 (U + 3000)。Members of the category, which includes the characters SPACE (U+0020), OGHAM SPACE MARK (U+1680), EN QUAD (U+2000), EM QUAD (U+2001), EN SPACE (U+2002), EM SPACE (U+2003), THREE-PER-EM SPACE (U+2004), FOUR-PER-EM SPACE (U+2005), SIX-PER-EM SPACE (U+2006), FIGURE SPACE (U+2007), PUNCTUATION SPACE (U+2008), THIN SPACE (U+2009), HAIR SPACE (U+200A), NARROW NO-BREAK SPACE (U+202F), MEDIUM MATHEMATICAL SPACE (U+205F), and IDEOGRAPHIC SPACE (U+3000). - 成员类别，只包含行分隔符字符 (U + 2028)。Members of the category, which consists solely of the LINE SEPARATOR character (U+2028). - 成员类别，只包含段落分隔符字符 (U + 2029)。Members of the category, which consists solely of the PARAGRAPH SEPARATOR character (U+2029). - 字符表的字符 (U + 0009)、 换行符 (U + 000A)、 行表 (U + 000B)、 换页符 (U + 000 C)、 回车符 (U + 000d)，接下来行 (U + 0085)，并无中断空格 (U + 00A0)。The characters CHARACTER TABULATION (U+0009), LINE FEED (U+000A), LINE TABULATION (U+000B), FORM FEED (U+000C), CARRIAGE RETURN (U+000D), NEXT LINE (U+0085), and NO-BREAK SPACE (U+00A0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取来自当前区域性的大小写规则。Casing rules are obtained from the current culture. 使用将字符串转换为小写。Use to convert a string to lowercase. ## Examples 下面的示例演示。The following example demonstrates . [!code-cpp[System.Char.ToLower#16](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Char.ToLower/CPP/tolower.cpp#16)] [!code-csharp[System.Char.ToLower#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Char.ToLower/CS/tolower.cs#16)] [!code-vb[System.Char.ToLower#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Char.ToLower/VB/tolower.vb#16)]

span.para: 中所述 [使用 Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/best-practices-strings.md) 有关最佳做法，我们建议你避免调用替换为默认值的字符大小写和字符串大小写方法。相反，应调用需要显式指定参数的方法。若要将字符转换为小写的通过使用当前区域性的大小写约定，调用方法的值的重载有关其参数。

As explained in [Best Practices for Using Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/best-practices-strings.md), we recommend that you avoid calling character-casing and string-casing methods that substitute default values. Instead, you should call methods that require parameters to be explicitly specified. To convert a character to lowercase by using the casing conventions of the current culture, call the method overload with a value of for its parameter.
